title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: The last direct heir-male having, as already mentioned, deceased in the person of the ninth LordBorthwick, in 1672, the castle and barony becamethe property of John Dundas of Harvistone, nephewof the deceased Lord Borthwick, and grandson ofSir James Dundas, of the distinguished family otArnistoun. It passed afterwards by purchase tothe family of Dalrymple of Cousland, and fromthence to that of Mitchelson of Middleton.
